donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Outcome 1: 	Robust national system for preparation of GHG emission inventories established

To achieve this outcome, the following outputs will be pursued:
1.	Strengthened institutional arrangements for compiling, archiving and documenting, updating, and managing GHG inventories;
2.	Enhanced technical capacity for preparing national GHG inventories;
  
3.	Improved national methodologies and activity data for preparing GHG inventories in key source categories identified; and
4.	QA/QC plans and procedures created. 

Outcome 2: 	Three NAMA proposals fully formulated within the context of national development priorities, including definition of the associated MRV systems.

To achieve this outcome, the following outputs will be pursued:
1.	Enhanced technical capacity for preparing NAMA proposals; 
2.	Emission scenarios for three chosen NAMAs verified/developed;
3.	Costing of the chosen NAMA proposals performed; and  
4.	MRV systems, including clear institutional arrangements, for the chosen NAMAs defined.

Outcome 3:	A National Climate Change Technology Action Plan has been developed. 

To achieve this outcome, the following outputs will be pursued:
1.	A review of the initial Technology Needs Assessment (2005) and preliminary/final results of the second TNA carried out; and
2.	A proposal on the creation of a national technology innovation centre and sub-national hubs/centres including a virtual platform as well as a technology registry prepared.
